review: Five minutes and it's done! Follow the simple directions and you're in Amazon land with many choices to pick from. I have a Vizio smart tv that I have had no end of problems keeping Netflix running. Constantly rebooting and endless buffering. No more! Fire Stick is fast and I can watch all the Netflix programs without any issues. I haven't delved into the other options for my Amazon Prime but I am looking forward to exploring them. I did bring up my playlists in my music on the Fire Stick and found I get lyrics with them now! Photos are next. May buy more for the other tvs that aren't "smart."
